title: Effect of inc in RIR on investment and savings

content.question: An increase in the real interest rate will most likely affect private investment in plant and equipment and the quantity of personal savings in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Private investment in plant and equipment will increase, and personal savings will increase.
Private investment in plant and equipment will increase, and personal savings will decrease.
Private investment in plant and equipment will decrease, and personal savings will increase.
Private investment in plant and equipment will decrease, and personal savings will not change.
Private investment in plant and equipment will not change, and personal savings will decrease.

content.answer: Private investment in plant and equipment will decrease, and personal savings will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
